title: Vanadium pentoxide interfacial layer enables high performance all-solid-state thin film batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15261-15269
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01849D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shiping Ma, Kaiyuan Wei, Yu Zhao, Jinxu Qiu, Rongrui Xu, Hongliang Li, Hui Zhang, Yanhua Cui
The V2O5 interfacial layer can effectively suppress side reaction between a LiCoO2 cathode and LiPON electrolyte interface, which enables enhanced lithium ion transport kinetics and electrochemical performance in all-solid-state thin film batteries.
